deploy.startCommand: python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate && gunicorn --workers=4 DataTraining.wsgi

services.name: web
services.startCommand: python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate && gunicorn --workers=4 DataTraining.wsgi

services.name: worker
services.startCommand: python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && celery -A DataTraining worker --loglevel=info
